name: Whole Grain Dijon Mustard
description: Finding the right balance of four simple ingredients, paired with a little time, is all that's needed to make an excellent whole grain Dijon mustard at home.

recipeInstructions.text: Place mustard seeds, wine, and vinegar in a small bowl or container, cover, and let soak at room temperature for two days.

Transfer mustard seeds and liquid to jar of a blender. Add in salt and sugar, if using, and puree until mustard paste forms, but whole seeds still remain. Transfer to an airtight container and let rest in refrigerator for 2 days before use.
